abstract: Some slightly contrarian thoughts that may offer comfort to the long-term investor, when ignoring the wild swings in the market gets difficult.
snippet: Some slightly contrarian thoughts that may offer comfort to the long-term investor, when ignoring the wild swings in the market gets difficult.
lead_paragraph: SINCE mid-August, world markets have repeatedly moved with stomach-churning ups and downs. And in response, many investors feel they must take some action for fear that doing nothing will cost more than doing something.

headline.main: Challenging Dollar-Cost Averaging and Other Bad Ideas
